product_name: The North Face Slingshot Daypack - Women's
long_description: The large main compartment on The North Face Slingshot women's daypack features a padded laptop sleeve that's great for use in town and a hydration port that will help you stay refreshed on the trail. Padded laptop sleeve in main compartment holds up to a 15 in. laptop or use the pocket to carry a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Women-specific padded, adjustable shoulder straps fit narrow shoulders comfortably; back panel is padded. Remove the webbing hipbelt and sternum strap when you're not on the trail. Full-length front pocket features a key clip and an organizer for pens, pencils, wallet, electronics and other necessities. The North Face Slingshot daypack features a front bungee cord where you can stash a jacket or bike helmet. Side compression straps; 2 side mesh quick-stash pockets.
short_description: The large main compartment on The North Face Slingshot women's daypack features a padded laptop sleeve that's great for use in town and a hydration port that will help you stay refreshed on the trail.
